about.sectionTitle: In Pursuit of Light, an exhibition of Albert Einstein's works
about.paragraph:
In the age of deepfakes and generative artificial intelligence, the reliability of our sensory perceptions is being undermined. We now live in a post-truth society where the boundary between reality and illusion is gradually blurring. Cutting-edge technologies flood our news feeds with unverifiable speculations, often generated by anonymous algorithms. 

Our online presence has become a meticulously orchestrated performance, a reflection of the selfie society. Social networks thrive on self-promotion and the relentless search for validation through likes and followers. The content we consume and create is increasingly standardized under the influence of influencers and algorithms, creating a disconnect between our digital personas and our authentic identities.
about.imgfooter: Albert Einstein, born on March 14, 1879 in Ulm.

privacyPolicy.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicy.description: Lunastra is committed to protecting the personal data of its users. This privacy policy explains how we collect, use, and share the personal data you provide us.

sections.title: Collection of personal data
sections.content: We collect personal data when you contact us or book a ticket. The data we collect may include your name, surname, or email address.

sections.title: Use of personal data
sections.content: We use your personal data to respond to your requests, confirm your reservations, or inform you about our services. We do not sell your personal data to third parties.

sections.title: Sharing of personal data
sections.content: We do not share your personal data with third parties, unless necessary to fulfill a specific request you have made.

sections.title: Retention of personal data
sections.content: We retain your personal data for as long as necessary to fulfill your request. We delete personal data from our systems once it is no longer needed.

sections.title: Security of personal data
sections.content: We take measures to protect your personal data from loss, theft, misuse, or unauthorized access. We use security measures such as data encryption and strong password policies to protect your data.

sections.title: Right of access and rectification of personal data
sections.content: You have the right to request access and rectification of your personal data. To do so, please contact us at the email address lunastra.contact@gmail.com or the postal address listed above (see legal notices).

sections.title: Changes to the privacy policy
sections.content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page.

sections.title: Contact us
sections.content: If you have any questions or concerns about this privacy policy or the use of your personal data, please contact us at the email address or postal address listed above (see legal notices).

sections.title: Modification of the T&Cs

sections.title: Governing law
